channel.title: Automation on Dev Pages
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Dev Pages

item.title: Comparing four ai generators generating a voting app
item.description: Using the same prompt on four ai app generators to see how they compare. Main goal is to generate a voting web app

item.title: Failing to sell a build optimization idea and not giving up
item.description: Have you ever tried to explain something that could be very helpful but seems too complicated to others because you did not properly present your idea?

item.title: Automate tasks and share using script files
item.description: A bit about using the power of scripts to help my comrades automate repeated tasks and process optimizations.
